mapper.insert: INSERT INTO checkin_record (user_id, target_type, target_id, photo_url, content, latitude, longitude, checkin_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{userId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{photoUrl}, #{content}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{checkinTime}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, target_type, target_id, photo_url, content, latitude, longitude, checkin_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM checkin_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT id, user_id, target_type, target_id, photo_url, content, latitude, longitude, checkin_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM checkin_record WHERE target_type = #{targetType} AND target_id = #{targetId} AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
